name: Escaping Project Paragon
description:
Escaping Project Paragon is a game where you play as Subject #34 and have just broken out of your cell in an evil science facility. Your main objective? Escape. You will have to use what you find around you, be it security keycards or beakers to aid you in this task. If you are observant, you may even discover clues as to the true nature of the facility...  

Team Prysmic Developers:

Producer: Holden Smith

Lead Designer: Flynn Van Stryp

https://flynn-van-stryp.itch.io/

Audio/Level Designer: Zachery Reichelt

https://dakunaku.itch.io/

https://uniquisher.itch.io/

Environment Artist: Scott Hancock

https://spikey415.itch.io/

Character Artist: Angelika Rye

https://mozazr.itch.io/

Environment/Texture Artist: Allan Tran

Environment/VFX Artist: Kent Suter
